channel.title: Comments on: Mushroom and Cheese Strudel

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
Hi Everyone, glad you all liked the recipe and hope I've inspired some of you to make it :)
Hi Beta Gal - Bacon you say?! I love bacon, it could make almost anything better :)
Hi Alexandra - I'm a hoarder of recipes too... now I just have to try and organise myself a bit better.
Hi Steph - I think it would wonderfully with filo pastry too.
Hi Belle - Me too - with taking recipes from everywhere. Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi Everyone, glad you all liked the recipe and hope I’ve inspired some of you to make it ðŸ™‚

Hi Beta Gal – Bacon you say?! I love bacon, it could make almost anything better ðŸ™‚

Hi Alexandra – I’m a hoarder of recipes too… now I just have to try and organise myself a bit better.

Hi Steph – I think it would wonderfully with filo pastry too.

Hi Belle – Me too – with taking recipes from everywhere. Thanks

item.title: By: Zita
item.dc:creator: Zita
item.description: looks sooo delicious....just at the right moment I too have been craving for savory strudel... mmmm, wish could get some of yours :)
item.content:encoded: looks sooo delicious….just at the right moment I too have been craving for savory strudel… mmmm, wish could get some of yours ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Belle@OohLook
item.dc:creator: Belle@OohLook
item.description: Hehe, I always get the recipes from the supermarket, and from the back of packets, the newspaper, etc. And from other people's blogs, yours included. That mushroom strudel is a good find, by the way.
item.content:encoded: Hehe, I always get the recipes from the supermarket, and from the back of packets, the newspaper, etc. And from other people’s blogs, yours included. That mushroom strudel is a good find, by the way.

item.title: By: Sophia
item.dc:creator: Sophia
item.description: Oh man. I am DROOLING! These look absolutely scrumptious! That hot piping filling...oh my!
item.content:encoded: Oh man. I am DROOLING! These look absolutely scrumptious! That hot piping filling…oh my!

item.title: By: parita
item.dc:creator: parita
item.description: I love savory pies and strudels, this looks perfect!
item.content:encoded: I love savory pies and strudels, this looks perfect!

item.title: By: grace
item.dc:creator: grace
item.description: i usually like my strudels sweet and fruit-laden, but your glorious use of brie has convinced me otherwise. plus, i feel that puff pastry can do no wrong. :)
item.content:encoded: i usually like my strudels sweet and fruit-laden, but your glorious use of brie has convinced me otherwise. plus, i feel that puff pastry can do no wrong. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: the pastry looks so flaky with the gooey oozy center. I would easily gobble this up with a nice glass of merlot!
item.content:encoded: the pastry looks so flaky with the gooey oozy center. I would easily gobble this up with a nice glass of merlot!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: That looks so delicious! And how funny to find that on a recipe card. I always thought that they'd have not so great recipes but obviously I was wrong! :)
item.content:encoded: That looks so delicious! And how funny to find that on a recipe card. I always thought that they’d have not so great recipes but obviously I was wrong! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Rilsta
item.dc:creator: Rilsta
item.description: This looks really delicious and what better combination than mushrooms and melted brie!
item.content:encoded: This looks really delicious and what better combination than mushrooms and melted brie!

item.title: By: Steph
item.dc:creator: Steph
item.description: Yumm...that looks like a delicious strudel, how surprising that you got the recipe from a pamphlet! I wonder if it would work with filo pastry too?
item.content:encoded: Yumm…that looks like a delicious strudel, how surprising that you got the recipe from a pamphlet! I wonder if it would work with filo pastry too?
